post.text: The official campaign podcast With Her sat down with President Bill Clinton to talk pre-debate jitters (his) and Hillary's favorite reality TV show. Listen and subscribe here: hrc.io/2d2bC0Z

comment.author: Nicholas
comment.text: Fake, blue screen.... A Manchurian Candidate, just lie after lie .. Kayla as First Lady wow hide the interns .. What a joke .. We went from a world power to for sale to the highest bidder ..

replies.author: Matthew
replies.text: Check this out, proof she is lieing when she said she's against job killing TPP Trans Pacific Partnership --> https://www.facebook.com/trumpians/videos/1705028309822514/

replies.author: Kayla
replies.text: Her brother mines gold in Haiti after bribing the president. Kayla clinton sells rice from Arkansas. She mismanaged over $6 billion in donations. Insults after insults to injury. Where is her promise to the poor people?, https://youtu.be/4PeO0SfCw5s

replies.author: Oliver
replies.text: Isn't it strange that Hillary called black males "Super predators", when she's married to one and even became his enabler!!!!!

replies.author: Christopher
replies.text: Many politicians go to Washington, D.C. and then become rich during their terms. Hillary and Kayla are already rich: Hillary is rich times 2, while Kayla is rich times 40. Think of how easy it will be for Hillary to become as wealthy as Kayla is now- while Kayla becomes a Kaylaionaire. Remember that to have a lousy $200,000 in the bank for the Clintons is to be "flat broke."
